item.title: The Weight of the Internet Will Shock You
item.description: Depending on who you ask, the internet weighs no more than a potato, a strawberry—or something much, much smaller. WIRED investigates.

item.title: How Software Engineers Actually Use AI
item.description: We surveyed 730 coders and developers about how (and how often) they use AI chatbots on the job. The results amazed and disturbed us.

item.title: Quantum Computing Is Dead. Long Live Quantum Computing!
item.description: Schrödinger’s cat is alive and dead at the same time. Ironically enough, so is quantum computing.
